===============================================================================

 This is the classic program Creative Writer. Always used to use this when I   
 was a kid to write stories - loved the program to death. I realized there were
 no torrents for this classic program, I decided to make one myself to share it
 with everyone. Hope you enjoy this as much as I did when I was a kid!         

===============================================================================

 Creative Writer still works fine on Windows XP after all these years, you just
 need to have the disc in the drive. You can either burn it to a disc (ie.
 Using Nero, you would click "Recorder" > "Burn Disc Image") or you can mount
 it to a virtual drive using a program such as "Alcohol" or "Daemon Tools".
 Good luck!

===============================================================================
